name: vrchat-guidebook
description: VRChat community guide site built with VitePress

scripts.docs:build:local: cross-env SITE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:4174 SITE_BASE=/ vitepress build docs
scripts.verify: npm run docs:build && npm run lint:a11y && npm run lint:contrast
scripts.guide:build:web: npm run guide:run -- --suite automation/robot/web-example.robot --output artifacts/web-example --markdown docs/controls/auto-web-example.md
scripts.guide:build:unity: npm run guide:run -- --suite automation/robot/unity-editor-basic.robot --output artifacts/unity-editor-basic --markdown docs/controls/auto-unity-editor-basic.md
scripts.guide:build: npm run guide:build:web && npm run guide:build:unity
